name: Abímbọ́lá mi
wishText: Happy birthday to the one who's the perfect blend of strength and flexibility, just like a well-designed structure! Wishing you a year filled with beams of joy and columns of my love! 🎉🏗️💖
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Abimbola!! Yeee! Many many happy returns blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something more in a nerdy way
text5Content: You are Special to me baby
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
